price: 61. Bazali na botutu, bisika binso bakozuama, bakokangama mpe bakobomama na mawa te.
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
